title: My Day
description: My Day tells the story of a little boy and his daily activities. The text guides readers through the typical activities of a child's day: waking up, getting ready for breakfast, going to school, playing, eating dinner, and going to bed.
meta: afternoon, bright, evening, morning, night, noon
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge
Long Vowel Sounds : Discriminate the long /a/ vowel sound
Vowel Digraphs : Read words with vowel digraph ay
Capitalization and Punctuation : Use initial capitalization and end punctuation correctly
Antonyms : Recognize and understand that some words mean the opposite or nearly the opposite of each other

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
